name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-Kisan)
description: Chhote aur madhyam kisanon ko har saal teen kiston me nirdharit rashi di jati hai jo seed, khaad, diesel jaise kharchon me madad karti hai.
category: Income support for small and marginal farmers

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban/Gramin)
description: Shehri aur gramin gareeb parivaron ko pakka ghar banane ya sudharne ke liye financial assistance.
category: Housing support for economically weaker families

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: BPL family ki mahila ke naam par free LPG connection provide karne ki yojana, taaki ghar me clean cooking fuel use ho sake.
category: Clean cooking fuel for low-income households

name: Ayushman Bharat – Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
description: Gambhir bimari ke liye gareeb parivaron ko har saal ek fixed limit tak cashless treatment cover provide kiya jata hai empanelled hospitals me.
category: Health insurance for poor and vulnerable families

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Ladki ke naam se long-term deposit account jisme parents fixed amount jama karke future education aur marriage ke liye fund bana sakte hain.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (Shishu/Kishor/Tarun)
description: Chhote vyapaar, dukaan, self-employed logon ke liye business shuru ya expand karne ke liye collateral-free loan facility.

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: Unorganised sector ke workers ke liye retirement ke baad fixed pension dene wali contributory pension scheme.

name: Telangana Rythu Bandhu Scheme
description: Telangana ke registered kisanon ko har cropping season per acre input assistance di jati hai taaki beej, khaad, pesticides ka kharcha nikal sake.

name: Andhra Pradesh Jagananna Amma Vodi
description: Andhra Pradesh me gareeb families ki mothers/guardians ko har saal amount diya jata hai taaki unke bachche school/college me padhai jaari rakh saken.
category: Financial assistance to mothers for children education

name: MP Mukhyamantri Kisan Anudan Yojana
description: Madhya Pradesh ke kisanon ko krishi yantra (tractor, power tiller, irrigation pump wagairah) kharidne par subsidy di jati hai.

name: Maharashtra Bal Sangopan Yojana
description: Maharashtra me economic difficulty ki wajah se apne bachchon ka palan-poshan karne me pareshaan parivaron ko per child monthly financial support diya jata hai.
category: Child welfare support for low-income families

name: Rajasthan Mukhyamantri Chiranjeevi Swasthya Bima Yojana
description: Rajasthan ke families ko government empanelled hospitals me cashless treatment cover (health insurance) provide karne wali scheme.

name: West Bengal Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme
description: West Bengal ki women heads of family ke liye monthly financial assistance, mainly SC/ST/General poor households ke liye.

name: Bihar Mukhyamantri Kanya Utthan Yojana (Birth to Graduation)
description: Bihar me ladkiyon ke liye different stages (birth se graduation completion tak) par financial assistance – school uniform, sanitary napkins, graduation incentive, etc.
category: Comprehensive support scheme for girl child
